entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
